titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to permit the disclosure to governmental authorities by electronic communication providers of the names and addresses associated with phone numbers supplied by such authorities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 6/30/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to permit electronic communication providers to disclose the following information to a governmental entity: (1) any publicly available information; and (2) the name and address associated with a phone number provided by such entity. (Current law requires an administrative subpoena, warrant, court order, or consent before such information can be provided.)
